TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
you get put into a coma due to the world collapsing.

I wish that I was a firebender (Avatar The Last Airbender reference).

Granted but you burn yourself in a freak accident.

I wish that I had a party cannon!

Granted, it shoots backwards and gives you a concussion.

I wish to not be cross eyed anymore so I can see depth.

Granted, you lose your eyes in a freak-sightseeing accident.

I wish Arstotzka was real.

Granted. It is swiftly conquered by Russia.

I wish for a room builder.

Granted. Unfortunately, it only builds copies of the movie "The Room" and forces you to watch each copy it produces.

I wish for a new Brand New album within the next year

Granted. The album is a photo album of explicit gore. It causes you to stab your eyes out of shock.

I wish I could into space.

You suddenly into space. Struggling to hold your breath, you manage to last the full thirty seconds before you expire. No Heart of Gold is coming to rescue you.

I wish that I had unlimited internet access.

Granted. The cable is inefficient, so sending more than 1 megabyte through it will cause the universe to collapse from a hypermassive photon quantum.

I wish for a hypermassive photon quantum.

Granted, but superheroes will now prevent you from utilizing this new power.

I wish for a new smartphone.

Granted. Have my old broken Iphone 3! it's new for you because you never owned my iphone 3!

I wish for a 1 meter diameter potato chip.

I wish Obama wasn't President of the United States.

- - - Updated - - -

and granted, only you die before you can finish it from overeating

Granted, George triple-U Bush now is!

I wish to finish that potato chip!

Granted, but the remaining chip was able to kill you from overeating.

I wish for a small cookie.

Granted. The cookie tracks your browsing habits and sends them to your mom/girlfriend/boss.

I wish Internet privacy wasn't so complicated.

Granted, it's nonexistent! everyone can just watch other people's activities live! took care of that problem.

I wish for self-washing dishes. Just leave them on the table and they become clean.

Granted, but you can never afford them.

I wish for this keyboard to be better with typing.

Granted. It's a dvorak keyboard now.

I wish Valentine's Day would just sod off.

Granted. Poof,Valentines day no longer exists,so tomorrow just skips to sunday.

I wish that i could own alot of jelly beans.
Granted. It gets planted in the ground, where it grows and makes new Valentine's days.

Granted. Poof,Valentines day no longer exists,so tomorrow just skips to sunday.

I wish that i could own alot of jelly beans.

Granted. They're poisoned jelly beans.

I wish that Minecraft mods were easier to install.

Granted, but the mods conflict with your .jar.

I wish I could go back in time and ride on Apollo 11!

You are strapped to the outside of the rocket. The results are predictable; you don't live very long.

I wish for a life.

Granted. You are now Hitler. (he had one heck of a life do you not agree?)

I wish for better design skillz.

Granted. You are now an arts major with no job and no perspective whatsoever. The subway tunnels await you...

I wish for a better plane than my L-13 BlanÃƒÂ­k.
